bibl.title: "ÉEpioÊsiow" in a Documentary Papyrus? <epiousios>
bibl.note: P. Yale Inv. 19 (= S.B. I, 5224), 20 contains the only attestation of ἐπιούσιος in a documentary papyrus, but the reading is incorrect. This papyrus should no longer be taken into consideration for a discussion about the adjective in the Lord's Prayer. The handwriting dates from the Ist/IInd century A.D.
bibl.seg: NIJMAN M. and K.A. WORP, "Ἐπιούσιος" in a Documentary Papyrus?

P. Yale Inv. 19 (= S.B. I, 5224), 20 contains the only attestation of ἐπιούσιος in a documentary papyrus, but the reading is incorrect. This papyrus should no longer be taken into consideration for a discussion about the adjective in the Lord's Prayer. The handwriting dates from the Ist/IInd century A.D.
